title: Assistant not working when "Web and app activity" setting enabled
content:
I've been troubleshooting this for days.
Conclusion is that Assistant fails (stalls with three pulsating dots) to do basic tasks like timers, texts and calls when the "web and app activity" toggle is enabled in assistant data and privacy settings. 
Used to work three days ago. 
Have tried zeroing my device, change Google app version, clear data and cache. 
Works with blank slate test Google account on same device 

Android 10 and Pixel 3, april 5th security update
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
